title-group.article-title: A Model-Based Failsafe System for the Continental TEVES Electronic-Stability-Program (ESP)

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: The Electronic Stability Program (ESP) is a vehicle dynamics control system that supports the driver in critical driving situations. A basic component integrated in the ESP-system is an on-line sensor monitoring system which is mainly used for detecting faults in sensors as early as possible so that an erroneous control or system malfunction can be prevented. Aim of this contribution is to present a model based sensor monitoring system for ESP that was developed, implemented, and is produced in large volumes by Continental Teves.
